verses.verse: You, <WH1121> son of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> to the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> and say, <WH559> You mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh. <WH3068>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Because the enemy <WH341> has said <WH559> against you, <WH1889> Aha! and, <WH5769> The ancient high places <WH1116> are ours in possession; <WH4181>

therefore prophesy, <WH5012> and say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Because, <WH8074> even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up <WH7602> on every side, <WH5439> that you might be a possession <WH4181> to the residue <WH7611> of the nations, <WH1471> and you are taken up <WH5927> in the lips <WH8193> of talkers, <WH3956> and the evil report <WH1681> of the people; <WH5971>

therefore, <WH2022> you mountains of Israel, <WH3478> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH136> to the mountains <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the watercourses <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> to the desolate <WH8074> wastes <WH2723> and to the cities <WH5892> that are forsaken, <WH5800> which are become a prey <WH957> and derision <WH3933> to the residue <WH7611> of the nations <WH1471> that are all around; <WH5439>

therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Surely in the fire <WH784> of my jealousy <WH7068> have I spoken <WH1696> against the residue <WH7611> of the nations, <WH1471> and against all Edom, <WH123> that have appointed <WH5414> my land <WH776> to themselves for a possession <WH4181> with the joy <WH8057> of all their heart, <WH3824> with despite <WH7589> of soul, <WH3824> to cast it out <WH4054> for a prey. <WH957>

Therefore prophesy <WH5012> concerning the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> the mountains <WH2022> and to the hills, <WH1389> to the watercourses <WH650> and to the valleys, <WH1516> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH1696> I have spoken in my jealousy <WH7068> and in my wrath, <WH2534> because you have borne <WH5375> the shame <WH3639> of the nations: <WH1471>

therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> I have <WH5375> sworn, <WH3027> saying, <WH1471> Surely the nations that are around <WH5439> you, <WH5375> they shall bear their shame. <WH3639>

But you, <WH2022> mountains of Israel, <WH3478> you shall shoot forth <WH5414> your branches, <WH6057> and yield <WH5375> your fruit <WH6529> to my people <WH5971> Israel; <WH3478> for they are at hand <WH7126> to come. <WH935>
For, <WH6437> behold, I am for you, and I will turn into you, <WH5647> and you shall be tilled and sown; <WH2232>

and I will multiply <WH7235> men <WH120> on you, <WH1004> all the house of Israel, <WH3478> even all of it; <WH5892> and the cities shall be inhabited, <WH3427> and the waste <WH2723> places shall be built; <WH1129>

and I will multiply <WH7235> on you man <WH120> and animal; <WH929> and they shall increase <WH7235> and be fruitful; <WH6509> and I will cause you to be inhabited <WH3427> after your former estate, <WH6927> and will do better <WH2895> to you than at your beginnings: <WH7221> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

Yes, <WH120> I will cause men to walk <WH3212> on you, <WH5971> even my people Israel; <WH3478> and they shall possess <WH3423> you, <WH5159> and you shall be their inheritance, and you shall no more <WH3254> henceforth bereave them of children. <WH7921>
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Because they say <WH559> to you, <WH398> You are a devourer of men, <WH120> and have been a bereaver <WH7921> of your nation; <WH1471>
therefore you shall devour <WH398> men <WH120> no more, <WH7921> neither bereave your nation <WH1471> any more, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh; <WH3069>

neither will I let you hear <WH8085> any more the shame <WH3639> of the nations, <WH1471> neither shall you bear <WH5375> the reproach <WH2781> of the peoples <WH5971> any more, <WH1471> neither shall you cause your nation to stumble <WH3782> any more, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
Moreover the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> when the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> lived <WH3427> in their own land, <WH127> they defiled <WH2930> it by their way <WH1870> and by their doings: <WH5949> their way <WH1870> before <WH6440> me was as the uncleanness <WH2932> of a woman in her impurity. <WH5079>

Therefore I poured <WH8210> out my wrath <WH2534> on them for the blood <WH1818> which they had poured <WH8210> out on the land, <WH776> and because they had defiled <WH2930> it with their idols; <WH1544>

and I scattered <WH6327> them among the nations, <WH1471> and they were dispersed <WH2219> through the countries: <WH776> according to their way <WH1870> and according to their doings <WH5949> I judged them. <WH8199>

When they came <WH935> to the nations, <WH1471> where they went, <WH935> they profaned <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name; <WH8034> in that men said <WH559> of them, <WH5971> These are the people of Yahweh, <WH3068> and are gone forth <WH3318> out of his land. <WH776>
But I had respect <WH2550> for my holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> which the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> had profaned <WH2490> among the nations, <WH1471> where they went. <WH935>

Therefore tell <WH559> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> I don't <WH6213> do this for your sake, <WH1004> house of Israel, <WH3478> but for my holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> which you have profaned <WH2490> among the nations, <WH1471> where you went. <WH935>

I will sanctify <WH6942> my great <WH1419> name, <WH8034> which has been profaned <WH2490> among the nations, <WH1471> which you have profaned <WH2490> in their midst; <WH8432> and the nations <WH1471> shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh, <WH136> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068> Yahweh, <WH3068> when I shall be sanctified <WH6942> in you before their eyes. <WH5869>
For I will take <WH3947> you from among <WH4480> the nations, <WH1471> and gather <WH6908> you out of all the countries, <WH776> and will bring <WH935> you into your own land. <WH127>
I will sprinkle <WH2236> clean <WH2889> water <WH4325> on you, <WH2891> and you shall be clean: from all your filthiness, <WH2932> and from all your idols, <WH1544> will I cleanse you. <WH2891>

I will also give <WH5414> you a new <WH2319> heart, <WH3820> and I will put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you; <WH5493> and I will take away the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of your flesh, <WH1320> and I will give <WH5414> you a heart <WH3820> of flesh. <WH1320>
I will put <WH5414> my Spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you, <WH6213> and cause you to walk <WH3212> in my statutes, <WH2706> and you shall keep <WH8104> my ordinances, <WH4941> and do them. <WH6213>
You shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> that I gave <WH5414> to your fathers; <WH1> and you shall be my people, <WH5971> and I will be your God. <WH430>
I will save <WH3467> you from all your uncleanness: <WH2932> and I will call <WH7121> for the grain, <WH1715> and will multiply <WH7235> it, <WH5414> and lay no famine on you. <WH7458>

I will multiply <WH7235> the fruit <WH6529> of the tree, <WH6086> and the increase <WH8570> of the field, <WH7704> that you may receive <WH3947> no more the reproach <WH2781> of famine <WH7458> among the nations. <WH1471>

Then you shall remember <WH2142> your evil <WH7451> ways, <WH1870> and your doings <WH4611> that were not good; <WH2896> and you shall loathe <WH6962> yourselves in your own sight <WH6440> for your iniquities <WH5771> and for your abominations. <WH8441>

Nor for your sake do <WH6213> I this, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH136> be it known <WH3045> to you: <WH954> be ashamed and confounded <WH3637> for your ways, <WH1870> house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> In the day <WH3117> that I cleanse <WH2891> you from all your iniquities, <WH5771> I will cause the cities <WH5892> to be inhabited, <WH3427> and the waste <WH2723> places shall be built. <WH1129>
The land <WH776> that was desolate <WH8074> shall be tilled, <WH5647> whereas it was a desolation <WH8077> in the sight <WH5869> of all who passed by. <WH5674>

They shall say, <WH559> This <WH1977> land <WH776> that was desolate <WH8074> has become like the garden <WH1588> of Eden; <WH5731> and the waste <WH2720> and desolate <WH8074> and ruined <WH2040> cities <WH5892> are fortified <WH1219> and inhabited. <WH3427>

Then the nations <WH1471> that are left <WH7604> around <WH5439> you shall know <WH3045> that I, <WH3068> Yahweh, have built <WH1129> the ruined <WH2040> places, <WH5193> and planted that which was desolate: <WH8074> I, <WH3068> Yahweh, have spoken <WH1696> it, <WH6213> and I will do it.

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> For this, <WH1875> moreover, will I be inquired of by the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> to do <WH6213> it for them: <WH7235> I will increase them with men <WH120> like a flock. <WH6629>

As the flock <WH6629> for sacrifice, <WH6944> as the flock <WH6629> of Jerusalem <WH3389> in her appointed feasts, <WH4150> so shall the waste <WH2720> cities <WH5892> be filled <WH4392> with flocks <WH6629> of men; <WH120> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
